nodes.text: The youngest son of House Elegin on the planet Asmeru lived a double life as the head of a pirate crew during the final decades of the Galactic Republic's existence. He took Q'anah, the daughter of his house's head of security, as his mistress and she eventually joined his crew, living a colorful and bawdy life while fighting alongside his men, and eventually giving birth to her lover's triplets. The young noble was eventually captured and tried, before being executed on the planet Karfeddion. Following the noble's death, Q'anah took control of his crew and dedicated herself to taking revenge on the starships and settlements of the Senex-Juvex sectors.
Q'anah's lover was first mentioned but not named in the novel Tarkin, which was written by James Luceno and released in 2014.
